short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have fun with some smokey colorful search options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fun graphic Chrome extension that adds colorful background effects to your search tabs!

By clicking "Add to Chrome," I accept and agree to install the Smokey Search extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in terms of use OceanicAds  and Privacy Policy OceanicAds.

Terms Of Use: https://oceanicads.com/terms-and-conditions
